setAmbientLight

public static void setAmbientLight(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl,
                                   float[] ambientLightColor)
Set the color of the Global Ambient Light. Affects all objects in scene regardless of their placement.

Parameters:
gl - the gl
ambientLightColor - the ambient light color

setLight

public static void setLight(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl,
                            int GLLightHandle,
                            float[] color,
                            float[] position)
Simple way to setup a light. Uses same color for direct light (diffuse), reflected highlight (specular) and scattered light (ambient). Ambient color is darkened to 1/4 of the light color.

Parameters:
GLLightHandle - the gL light handle
color - the color
position - the position
gl - the gl

setLight

public static void setLight(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl,
                            int GLLightHandle,
                            float[] diffuseLightColor,
                            float[] ambientLightColor,
                            float[] specularLightColor,
                            float[] position)
Set the color of a 'positional' light (a light that has a specific position within the scene).

Params:
an OpenGL light number (GL11.GL_LIGHT1),
'Diffuse': color of direct light from this source,
'Ambient': color of scattered light from this source
'Specular': color of this light reflected off a surface,
position.

Parameters:
gl - the gl
GLLightHandle - the gL light handle
diffuseLightColor - the diffuse light color
ambientLightColor - the ambient light color
specularLightColor - the specular light color
position - the position

setLightPos

public static void setLightPos(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl,
                               int GLLightHandle,
                               float x,
                               float y,
                               float z)
Set the position of a light to the given xyz.
NOTE: Positional light only, not directional.

Parameters:
gl - the gl
GLLightHandle - the gL light handle
x - the x
y - the y
z - the z

disableLight

public static void disableLight(javax.media.opengl.GL2 gl,
                                int GLLightHandle)
Disables the given light. (GL10.GL_LIGHT0..7)

Parameters:
gl - the gl
GLLightHandle - the gL light handle
